name: DARKCUBE (CUBEATHON REMIX)
description:
DARKCUBE - A remix of the Cubeathon originally made by the YouTuber Brackeys. 

Controls 

- Left Arrow/A - Move left.

- Right Arrow/D - Move right. 

This game uses the Noto Sans JP font, licenced under the Open Fonts Licence. 

Use the WebGL version for medium quality. Use the Windows EXE version for the best quality.
